message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. I believe this is a fair starting point considering its worth.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While $11,500 is tempting, I'm still aiming a bit higher. Would you consider $13,000?  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,200?
